Title: The Last Supper
Writer: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, Abbi Jacobson (creator), Ilana Glazer (creator)
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, Rudy De La Cruz, Michael J. Burg
Plot: The girls go to a fancy-ass restaurant for Abbi's birthday. Abbi must come to terms with being a "nasty bitch" while Ilana pushes through self-inflicted side effects of their hoity toity meal.
